command.name: mysql-users
command.label: Returns users
command.description: Returns all users stored in the mysql database.

command.name: mysql-add-user
command.label: Show add user
command.description: Shows the MySQL add user panel.

command.name: mysql-edit-user
command.label: Show edit user
command.description: Shows the MySQL edit user panel.

command.name: mysql-profiles
command.label: Returns profiles
command.description: Returns all profiles stored in the mysql database.
